CalvesSL45CalfPress.name: Sled 45째 Calf Press
CalvesSL45CalfPress.preparation: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSL45CalfPress.execution: Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSL45CalfPress.comments: Reposition stance if feet slip. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. Movement can also be performed on Bilateral 45 Leg Press apparatus. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSL45AlternatingCalfPress.name: Sled 45째 Alternating Calf Press
CalvesSL45AlternatingCalfPress.preparation: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Grasp handles to sides. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSL45AlternatingCalfPress.execution: Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSL45AlternatingCalfPress.comments: Lower weight back into starting position if feet slip. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. Exercise can also be performed with Simultaneous Extension. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSL45CalfRaise.name: Sled 45째 Calf Raise
CalvesSL45CalfRaise.preparation: Sit on machine with lower back against padding and grasp handles to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on foot platform with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees.
CalvesSL45CalfRaise.execution: Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSL45CalfRaise.comments: Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. Also known as Sled Donkey Calf Raise. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSL45CalfPressPL.name: Sled 45째 Calf Raise (plate loaded)
CalvesSL45CalfPressPL.preparation: Sit on machine with lower back against padding and grasp handles to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on foot of platform with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees.
CalvesSL45CalfPressPL.execution: Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSL45CalfPressPL.comments: Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. Also known as Sled Donkey Calf Raise. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLDonkeyCalfRaise.name: Sled Donkey Calf Raise
CalvesSLDonkeyCalfRaise.preparation: Position lower back and hips under upper pad. Place forearms on supports. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees.
CalvesSLDonkeyCalfRaise.execution: Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLDonkeyCalfRaise.comments: Position upper pad just below lowest range of motion. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLHackCalfPress.name: Sled Hack Calf Press
CalvesSLHackCalfPress.preparation: Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSLHackCalfPress.execution: Push sled up away from platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLHackCalfPress.comments: Not all Hack Squat machines have platform with opened lower end allowing for this movement, but some platforms may accommodate calf block, see example. Disengage docking lever if it impedes movements. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergist muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLLyingCalfPress.name: Sled Lying Calf Press
CalvesSLLyingCalfPress.preparation: Position sled away from platform. Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSLLyingCalfPress.execution: Push sled away from platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLLyingCalfPress.comments: Position sled back yet not so far that weight bottoms out during stretch. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergist muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLLyingCalfPressPL.name: Sled Lying Calf Press (plate loaded)
CalvesSLLyingCalfPressPL.preparation: Position sled away from platform. Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSLLyingCalfPressPL.execution: Push sled away from platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLLyingCalfPressPL.comments: If sled bottoms out on dock lever, disengage it to allow full range of motion. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergist muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLSeatedCalfPress.name: Sled Seated Calf Press
CalvesSLSeatedCalfPress.preparation: Place seat away from platform. Sit on seat and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSLSeatedCalfPress.execution: Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLSeatedCalfPress.comments: Position seat back yet not so far that weight bottoms out during stretch. Reposition stance if feet slip. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLStandingCalfRaise.name: Sled Standing Calf Raise
CalvesSLStandingCalfRaise.preparation: Place shoulders under padded bars. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded bars. Stand erect by extending hips and knees.
CalvesSLStandingCalfRaise.execution: Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLStandingCalfRaise.comments: Position sled just below lowest range of motion. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. Also see exercise on alternative apparatus with back pad. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLForwardAngledCalfRaise.name: Sled Forward Angled Calf Raise
CalvesSLForwardAngledCalfRaise.preparation: Lie forward so chest is on pad and shoulders are under padded bars. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded bars. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Release lever if available.
CalvesSLForwardAngledCalfRaise.execution: Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLForwardAngledCalfRaise.comments: Sled can be positioned just below lowest range of motion. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.

CalvesSLVerticalCalfPress.name: Sled Vertical Calf Press
CalvesSLVerticalCalfPress.preparation: Lie on back pad. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on platform with heels and arches extending off.
CalvesSLVerticalCalfPress.execution: Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.
CalvesSLVerticalCalfPress.comments: Reposition stance if feet slip. Keep knees straight throughout exercise or bend knees slightly only during stretch. Quadriceps serve as synergists muscle if knees are bent slightly during stretch. See Calf Exercise Analyses.
